page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: ON A MONDAY AT 7.30am. I GET UP, GET DRESSED, COMB MY HAIR, MAKE MY BED AND OPEN MY CURTAINS. MY BREAKFAST CONSISTS OF RICE CRISPIES, TEA AND TOAST. I THEN CATCH MY SCHOOL BUS FROM THE CORNER OF MY AVENUE AT 8.15pm. WE MAKE SEVERAL STOPS INCLUDING ONE AT ROCHSOLLOCH SCHOOL WHERE WE PICK UP PEOPLE FROM COATDYKE.WE THEN MAKE OUR JOURNEY TO ALEXANDRA SCHOOL ARRIVING AT 8.40am.WE PLAY UNTIL THE BELL RINGS AT 9 O'CLOCK.OUR WORK CONSISTS OF SPELLING,MENTAL,ENGLISH,READING AND SCOTTISH PRIMARY MATHS. THEN WE HAVE A PLAYTIME AT 10.30 WHICH LASTS FOR FIFTEEN MINUTES.NEXT WE HAVE OUR FREE MILK AND LATER WE DO MAPPING SKILLS.THEN WE WORK AT OUR ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES PROJECT.FOR LUNCHI HAVE A CAN OF JUICE,ROLL ON SAUSAGE AND SWEETS.AT 1.15pm OUR BREAK ENDS.
